channel.title: Homes on Philipp Schindler
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Philipp Schindler

item.description: Biography I am a researcher working on experimental quantum information processing with trapped ions in the group of Rainer Blatt at the University of Innsbruck. We are working towards realizing a quantum computer with single atoms. Our experiments usually consist of implementing algorithms in a small-scale prototype as well as finding scalable architectures for quantum information processing with trapped ions. Besides physics I enjoy being outdoors, see a few sample photos

item.title: Selected Publications
item.description: The full list of publications is available at google scholar. Here are some highlighted and recent publications:
